main event: A shining object was observed over Pietarsaari, Finland on January 5, 1948.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 10 seconds., Eyewitnesses reported flames being emitted from the object., Grey streaks were left in the sky after the object's passage., The object's flight direction was from north to south., It was reported in connection with a series of sightings that involved other shining phenomena.
witness description: Eyewitnesses stated they observed the object in the sky.
